item.title: Private Transfers from Old Melbourne Gaol, Victoria to Spirit of Tasmania
item.description:
Why the Spirit of Tasmania is a Key Travel Link

The Spirit of Tasmania ferry service is a vital connection between Victoria and Tasmania, offering a comfortable and scenic way to travel across Bass Strait. If you’re travelling from Old Melbourne Gaol, the ferry terminal at Geelong provides convenient access to this unique journey. item.title: Airport Transfers from Melbourne & Avalon to Old Melbourne Gaol, Victoria
item.description:
Why Melbourne Airport Is a Top Choice for Travellers from Old Melbourne Gaol

Melbourne Tullamarine Airport is Victoria’s premier travel hub — serving millions of passengers with both domestic and international flights. If you’re based in Old Melbourne Gaol, this airport offers unmatched convenience, excellent facilities, and global connectivity.
